com.characterforming.jrte

Class Jrte

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.characterforming.jrte.Jrte

  • public final class Jrte
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Jrte main runtime transduction factory class. It opens a transducer gearbox and enumerates the target and effector namespaces on instantiation. The target and effector namespaces must be identical to the target and effector namespaces used to build the gearbox.

    Use transduction(ITarget) to instantiate a transduction for runtime application. To transduce the input starting with a specific transducer, call the ITransduction.start(String) and ITransduction.input(IInput[]) methods.

    This class is threadsafe, but ITransduction instances obtained from runtime instances of this class are not. Each ITransduction instance is expected to run on a single thread; otherwise, references to the instance must be synchronized by the client threads. If multiple ITransduction instances are run on concurrent threads using the same ITarget instance then references to the ITarget instance must be synchronized.

    Author:
    kb

    • Constructor Detail

      • Jrte

        public Jrte(java.io.File gearboxPath,
            java.lang.String targetClassName)
     throws GearboxException,
            TargetBindingException
        Constructor sets up the gearbox as an ITransduction factory. This will instantiate a proxy instance of the target class for effector binding as follows:

        Target.Target(); Target.getName(); bind(null); (Efffector.getName())*

        The proxy target instance is discarded after enumerating the target and effector namespace.

        Parameters:
        gearboxPath - The path to the gearbox
        targetClassName - The fully qualified Java class name of the target class to bind to the transduction stack
        Throws:
        GearboxException - On error
        TargetBindingException - On error

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        RteException,
                        GearboxException,
                        TargetBindingException,
                        InputException
        Default Jrte runtime transduces System.in to System.out, with an optional nil signal as input prefix. 
        Usage: java -cp Jrte.jar com.characterforming.jrte.Jrte [--nil] <transducer-name> <gearbox-path>
        Parameters:
        args - [--nil] <transducer-name> <gearbox-path>
        Throws:

        GearboxException - On error

        InputException - On error

      • transduction

        public ITransduction transduction(ITarget target)
                           throws TargetBindingException,
                                  TargetNotFoundException,
                                  GearboxException,
                                  RteException
        Bind an unbound target instance to a new transduction. Use the ITransduction.start(String) and ITransduction.run() methods to set up and run the transduction.
        Parameters:
        target - The ITarget instance to bind to the transduction
        Returns:
        The bound Transduction instance
        Throws:
        TargetBindingException - On error
        TargetNotFoundException - On error
        GearboxException - On error
        TargetNotFoundException - On error
        RteException

      • input

        public IInput input(char[][] input)
             throws GearboxException,
                    InputException
        Set up a transduction input source with a sequence of Unicode and signal ordinals. Each signal reference in the input array is mapped to the respective signal ordinal. Other tokens in the input array are treated as text Unicode ordinals.
        Parameters:
        input - The symbolic names for the signals and text segments to include in LIFO order (input[0] is last out)
        Returns:
        An IInput containing the signal sequence
        Throws:
        GearboxException - On error
        InputException - On error

             throws GearboxException,
                    InputException
        Set up a transduction input source with a text file as input source.
        Parameters:
        infile - The text input source
        Returns:
        An IInput wrapping the input source
        Throws:
        GearboxException - On error
        InputException - On error

             throws GearboxException,

        Set up a transduction input source with a raw file and charset decoder as input source.
        Parameters:
